Posts.EditableText:
I just tried to use the show-command in a new gamefile
When testing this command ("show mouse" and a mouse-object is in the inventory) it displays "I don't understand your command." instead of the defaulttemplate "You can't show it".  Perhaps there is something wrong with it?
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText: Ah, the verb template exists, but the verb itself doesn't! Logged http://quest.codeplex.com/workitem/942 (it will be a simple addition to CoreCommands.aslx).
